creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his famliy and friends
description: elongated oval flat body with beaded edge and reeded curved handles; unidentified family crest engraved in center; fully marked on underside
inscription:
Mark; Inscription

Crest of a leopard\'s head erased, perhaps for Blanch, Carnegir, or Reader.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside, overstriking HB (Hester Bateman) in script.
title: Small Tray
